attributes.action: SAVE BROMSGROVE MARKET HALL FOR THE PEOPLE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bromsgrove Council have decided to pull down a 14 year old market hall that cost half a million pounds to build. They will spend no less than £150,000 in demolition fees. The council said it was short of £300K from the gov't this year but goes ahead and spends half of that again. Support this petition to save the market hall for the people, we have already collected 1500 signatures but the council ignore it.

rejection.details: Please contact Bromsgrove Council in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
